venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our April JavaScript Meetup will be held Wednesday, April 28th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. When you arrive security will direct you to the correct floor. There is also parking available at a cheap evening rate in the building. Parking is also free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM.

At 7 PM Eric Ferraiuolo will demonstrate the YUI 3, YQL, Flickr, and Geolocation mashery he used to create Photos Around You, in surprisingly few lines of code. To find out more about Photos Around You, check out Eric's blog post: http://925html.com/co...

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any JavaScript-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza again. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests.
item.name: Photos Around You - Eric Ferraiuolo
